thread.section_title: Rush Order Tees Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rush Order Tees | rushordertees.com
thread.title: Dave Sause
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Dave Sause

author: Dave Sause
title: Dave Sause
text: This is was the third place I tried before finding someone to print on the sleeves of my shirt. They are super helpful. The next day they called to suggest an improvement to my graphics and then sent me approval proofs. They did all this for ONE shirt. They are fabulous and have earned all of my business.
